name: Death is the beginning (ko2fan)
description:
This game is part of https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

It was created in C with raylib. Assets are from https://kenney.nl/assets/toon-characters-1.

Unfortunately I could only spend 3 hours on this project. I had hoped to create a game where each time you died, you would come back with either a boost to attack speed or more health, but I ran out of time to implement.
